name: Hacker News - Improved readability
description: Changes the font and increases it's size and changes the colours to make links more obvious. The page is widened, indents are decreased and comments have their reply button moved to appear in the header line (see screenshot). Fading of down-voted comments is reduced.

user.name: spiralxuk
user.about:
Full-time developer and opinionated bastard about many things. including websites where I have to decide on whether reading the actual content is

a) going to damage my eyesight from squinting at the screen trying to deal with awful colours, horrible fonts, too much white-space, not enough white-space, moving the mouse triggering various 'value-added' widgets all over the screen etc. etc.

b) just going to be a horrible experience.

The answer is usually c) - don't bother - but sometimes Stylish (and GM/Scriptish) can really fix some niggling issues :)
